title: FutureBuilder
introductionEN: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a Future.
introductionCN: 基于与Future交互的最新快照构建自己的小部件。

title: StreamBuilder
introductionEN: Widget that builds itself based on the latest snapshot of interaction with a Stream.
introductionCN: 基于与Stream交互的最新快照构建自身的小组件。
